DOC.brief_summary: A multicenter, randomized, 3 arm, placebo-controlled clinical trial to assess the efficacy, safety and tolerability of pagoclone for adults with stuttering.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Pagoclone for Adults With Stuttering
DOC.detailed_description: A multicenter, randomized, 3-arm, placebo controlled, parallel group study with 24 weeks of double blind treatment followed by an 8 week double blind washout and then long-term open-label extension phase.
DOC.criteria: Male and females age 18 to 80 years presenting with a history of stuttering with onset prior to age 8 years old. Stuttering severity must be notable for > 3 syllables stuttered on a reading and cenversational task at scereening and with at least 2% contributed individually from conversational and reading tasks. Patients with unstable hematological, autoimmune, endocrine, neurological, renal, hepatic, retinal, gastrointestinal, or cardiovascular disease.
DOC.keyword: Adults with a history of stuttering
